column1: Kata Robata////Service was excellent. Our waiter introduced all our entrees. Portion sizes were small
column2: but the quality is exquisite and we were all savoring the flavors. Go early
column3: there's a happy hour. When we left around 8:15
column4: the parking lot was at capacity and there was definitely a wait. I definitely would return
column5: perhaps for happy hour or lunch
column6: to make it more palatable for my wallet.
